Body:
"""
        Test that an InvalidField exception is raised when sign is
        called without sufficient crypto parameters.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = None, None, None, None, None, None
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    'For signing, either a digital signature algorithm or a hash algorithm and a cryptographic algorithm must be specified.'
    , engine.sign, *args)
